node.name: Star Pro Drone MAKE: HUBSAN MODEL: H507A X4
node.description: The most inexpensive toy-class drone with auto fly feature, also altitude hold and set of GPS technology. With NO remote helping hand user need to control the drone through phone. Light weight and altitude reaches of 50 meter gave its industrial nickname of "Bee". (SIZE: 165x165x55mm / WEIGHT: 162 grams / CAMERA: 5MP)
node.content: Another Chinese manufacturer in fact entire toy-drone industry is dominant by this "Worlds Factory" made the flying replica of "Bee" in quadcopter shape / Powerful doubled coiled electric motor creates the 90 degree lift angle and position this drone in superiority at speed of 40 km per hour, also altitude gain of 50 meter / Smart features like auto-fly, altitude hold at time of clicking a picture makes it perfect drone for aerial photograph / It is totally controlled by App available in both android and apple store, that has advantage like GPS tracking and centring  which means at time of mis happening crash, user can track the position of drone / Waterproof but suggested by other users that do not fly in rainy day also "red-track-light" is placed at bottom of drone for monitoring the live position at night time flying / With single lithium ion battery and 5MP camera, it provide the 15 minutes backup or flight time that is enough to capture 100 quality photos or video of entire 500 meter long beach with average detailing.
node.alt: hubsan h507a x4 star app driven drone gps 6 axis gyro 720p hd camera rtf quadcopter-Multi color

node.name: IZI Nano Drone MAKE: SHIFT MODEL: IZIshiftred
node.description: Korean design that has changed the principles of drone manufacturing industry with very shifty manoeuvre like the name of this compact drone. Patented one hand controller and autonomous tracking mode while fly radius of 300 meter make it my pick selection. (SIZE: 115x115x58mm / WEIGHT: 90 grams / CAMERA: 5MP)
node.content: Design by South Korean company which has legacy to make electronic toy simple, brought this drone model into market against all odds like mobile control or console control / Like a real plane joystick, this quadcopter is operated using a single hand controller with real life motion sensors as game changer for toy drone industry / Ability to land on the hand palm and speed up to 40 Km per hour, it can touch an altitude of 15 meters / With single lithium ion battery it has 300 meter fly radius under clear weather and fly time of around 15 minutes while other users suggested not to fly at rain / Special advancement like stable hover, auto tracking mode and pre-programmed flight mode keep this drone in frame no matter what age of user is playing / 5MP camera, 2x zoom has configuration to click 1080 pixels of photo from 15 meter altitude which is up most best for aerial photoshoot.
node.alt: Shift IZI Nano Drone Camera 5MP FHD 1080P Patented 3DSensing Controller Autonomous Follow Me Mode 13 Mins Fly time Quadcopter

node.name: Tello Nano Drone MAKE: DJI MODEL: TLW004
node.description: Trusted technology with high customer satisfaction rating, a quadcopter with altitude reaches of 20 meters and speed of 28 Km/h which can perform aerial stunts like real fighter plane. With intel MotherBoard and high resolution 5MP camera it can capture and send real time videos. (SIZE: 98x93x41mm / WEIGHT: 100 grams / CAMERA: 5MP)
node.content: Legend Chinese brand and 2 times winner company of drone racing held by IDRA(International Drone Racing Association) made this quadcopter drone for aerial photoshoot and children play purpose / Inbuilt small gyroscope which itself recognize the orientation, angular velocity and maintain it using pre- program features / Can go up to altitude of 20 meters and with maximum speed of 28 km per hour, children can fly this drone along with birds / With single lithium ion battery it provide the 15 minutes backup or flight time that is enough to capture 100 quality photos or video of entire 500 meter long beach with average detailing / Waterproof components make it perfect piggy back range drone to fly under small rains but it is requested not to test its fly in heavy rains or storm / Simple guidelines to connect the drone camera with android smart phone or apple phone and for additional play purpose, gaming console is provided to connect phone through USB cable / 5 MP high resolution camera with 2x zoom advancement and battery that can charge within half an hour.
node.alt: DJI Tello Nano Drone (White) | 5MP Camera | 720p Recording | Intel Processor | Up to 13 mins of Flight time

node.name: Tello Boost Drone MAKE: DJI MODEL: TLW004
node.description: An updated version of "DJI-Tello Drone" with extra flight time using three combo battery and altitude reaches of 50 meter which is double than its first version. At technical point of view, more advanced users can also develop software applications for "Tello-Boost Drone" using the Tello SDK. (SIZE: 98x93x41mm / WEIGHT: 80 grams / CAMERA: 5MP)
node.content: "Play longer & Shoot wider", this second update version is benchmark for drone industry in all aspects of flying /  It comprise all the properties of previous version and in addition 3 batteries combo is provided to enhance its flight time / Don't be confused, in actual only one battery is placed at single time which has backup of 15 minutes for flight and 2 batteries remain on ground for standby / Now user can change the battery and also charge the discharge battery at circles time so that he can fly the drone continuously with a ground landing gap of 5 seconds / On weight section its component are re-design with extra light alloy plastic to cut around 20 grams so that altitude of 50 meter can be matched with this drone / Other factors like speed, camera resolution and phone+console monitoring remained  the same because of their un-matched performance.
node.alt: dji tello boost combo camera drone 5 mp with 3 batteries,charging hub dji authentic combo-Black
